summary: A peaceful, frightened little man is mistakenly identified as "the dragon", a notorious criminal at large. He briefly and reluctantly rules the underworld until they realize their mistake.
cast: Dinos Iliopoulos|Margarita Papageorgiou|Giannis Argyris|Thanasis Vengos|Theodoros Andriakopoulos|Marika Lekaki|Frixos Nassou|Kostas Stavrinoudakis|Manolis Vlachakis|Kostas Spagopoulos|Zizi Viopoulou|Kassi Janet|Andreas Douzos|Savvas Kalantzis|Notis Pitsilos|Nikos Tsachiridis|Alekos Tzanetakos|Anestis Vlahos|Zannino
title: El ogro de Atenas
